column5: The first satellite  Sputnik 1  was launched.
The smallest satellite launch vehicle (L-4S; 9.4t weight  1.4m diameter)
The first interplanetary launch by solid rocket (M-3SII)

column4: First man in space launched by an Asian space program

column5: The first asteroid ascent  sample return from an asteroid
Highest in history with altitude 865 km  also the fastest with speed 18k miles

column4: Manned foundations in space (STS-123  STS-124  STS-127)
column5: The world's largest pressurized volume in space[58]

column4: Indigenous Tracking & Data Relay Satellite System First TDRS system to support manned missions

column5: Discovered water on the Moon before impact.[59][60]
The first spacecraft to successfully demonstrate solar-sail technology in interplanetary space

column4: Lunar probe with extended deep space missions (asteroid mission to 4179 Toutatis).
First manned space docking by an Asian country (with Tiangong-1)
First lunar soft landing and lunar rover by an Asian country.
First successful Mars mission by an Asian country
column5: First Martian mission by a country to succeed on the first attempt. Third country to do so after the USSR and the USA.

column4: First to successfully launch and deploy 104 satellites simultaneously from a single rocket (PSLV -C37).[62][63]
column5: First country in the world to launch more than 100 satellites at one go.

column4: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon
column5: First soft landing on the far side of the Moon by any country. Landed with Yutu-2 rover.
